briefTitle: MammoScreen Breast Cancer Risk Assessment and Decision Aid for Breast Cancer Screening and Referrals
officialTitle: Implementing USPSTF Recommendations for Breast Cancer Screening and Prevention by Integrating Clinical Decision Support Tools With the Electronic Health Record
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women between the ages of 40 and 74
* Enrolled in MyChart
* Able to read English

Exclusion Criteria:

* Personal history of breast or ovarian cancer
* Currently Pregnant
* Currently in Hospice
